*** Settings ***
Library           com.automic.robot.itpa.ItpaLibrary

*** Variables ***
#---- VMWARE ---------------------
@{VM}             https://172.16.16.21/sdk    t.vn_test    ZHN7ujm+235wer    vvnsat01:2181    # url, user, pass
#---- AE -------------------------
@{AE}             AT11    172.16.36.72    2217    ${AE_CLIENT}/API/API    123    # system, host, port, user, pass
#---- APM ------------------------
@{APM}            # host, port, user, pass, path
#---- GLOBAL CONTEXT VARIABLES ---
${_AE_SYSTEM}     @{AE}[0]
${_AE_HOST}       @{AE}[1]
${_AE_PORT}       @{AE}[2]
${_AE_USER}       @{AE}[3]
${_AE_PASS}       @{AE}[4]
${_AE_TEMP_FOLD}    AT_TEMP

*** Key Words ***
Prepare AE
    Log    Prepare AE
    Vm Connect    @{VM}
    #Vm Revert    ${AE_HOST}    fresh
    Log    This step should do the copy client

Prepare Package
    [Arguments]    ${packageName}
    Log    Prepare package
    #Apm Connect    @{APM}[0]    @{APM}[1]    @{APM}[2]    @{APM}[3]    @{APM}[4]
    #Apm Run    install ${packageName} -pw 123 -y
